website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for exceptional performance in any indoor or outdoor setting, this is your best bet.
pros: Comes with an impressive array of features and a selection of powerful and bright LED lights
cons: Designed more for distance rather than close-up illumination

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headlamp to be used on a week long backpacking trip. Needless to say, I was left in the dark! I spent quite a bit more than I normally would because I was relying on the reputation of Black Diamond as being a superior brand. Boy, was I wrong! The "rechargeable" batteries won't hold a charge and the lamp itself isn't even that bright. I emailed Black Diamond 2 weeks ago and still haven't heard back. Oh well ... live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Bummed

customer_reviews.title: FAILED in cold temps TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: I changed out batteries for Lithium, as they perform better and last longer in colder temps. Tested and retested at home, functioned perfectly. Was heading to snow camp for a class. We had to hike into camp in a snowstorm, after dark. White light would not function. Could only get the red light to work. Returned home, worked fine. Went on another trip, 35° temps at night. Again, white light would not function, only red. Waste of money.....grrrr!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Headlamp works great.. The rechargeable batteries not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Headlamp in June 2018, I have used it a total of 5 times (3 of which to work outside on my truck at night). I went to charge it for a camping trip this weekend and the charging light is flashing red indicating a bad battery or an issue with the batteries... Tried swapping the placement of the batteries and still getting the red light. Unfortunately I am not pleased with the Headlamp having to replaced the rechargeable batteries this early in the game. I will use normal AAA's this weekend but I'll have to source rechargeable batteries to replace the bad ones in here.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: great if only the rechargeable batteries lasted
customer_reviews.text: great quality headlamp, good elastic band, nice spread of light. but the one failing of this light is the included batteries, they barely lasted an hour when new and now they last 5 minutes before the red low battery indicator lights and the light output fails.
customer_reviews.author: R. Guth

customer_reviews.title: A far cry from my current Blackdiamond Headlamp.
customer_reviews.text: I had nothing but trouble with the headlamp and the included batteries. The lithium batteries either would not charge or would not hold a charge for very long (it was some combination of both when I could get the headset to charge correctly). I had a constant flickering of the led lights and the performance was not as bright as my current Blackdiamond headlamp even when I used normal AAA batteries. Maybe I received a bad unit, but sadly I had to return this product. I still absolutely adore my current headlamp which is a Blackdiamond spot.
customer_reviews.author: chazkez

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality...From "Hero to Zero" in just 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Used about once a week and worked very well for about 6 months, bright light and comfortable, oops...then lights out! Quit charging! So, removed batteries, even tried standard AAA batteries, still doesnt work. Noted loose center battery and found the center battery does not make electrical contact but moves freely between contacts at each end. No spring tension. I bent (-) spring out and light worked briefly, then too loose again. Spring contact metal is soft and will not retain proper shape. Only way to use light is to place small wad of aluminum foil against (-) contact to shim battery against the contact. Too late to return to Amazon. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dayner

customer_reviews.title: Bright but no RED
customer_reviews.text: A nicer alternative to the clunky Storm model but my $20 Walmart headlamp has a better red light in it. It's so bad that it literally may not even be a red light on the thing. That's a major dealbreaker for me since i HATE HATE HATE ruining my night vision when i'm in the woods at night. But for you it may not be an issue....
customer_reviews.author: unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: These are great.. highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow. My hubby and I each got one. We have found we are pulling them out all the time around our home. We bought them to go out and patrol our yard in the night when the alarms go off. But we are using them in doing inside tasks as well. They charge up nicely and have different light setting. No more tripping in the dark. Bright and powerful.. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Keepsakes

customer_reviews.title: Batteries Bad, Light Good
customer_reviews.text: The batteries that come with it won't charge, but once you put in good rechargeables it works. It is a bit overcomplicated on the controls - On and Off would be nice, but this thing has fancy ways to dim and red light and strobe etc. I've never had occasion to need Red light or strobe and I imagine that if you needed that functionality you could get a device that did simply that. Let's say you are dying in a snow bank and what the strobe function unless you had internet access you'd never find out how to get the damn thing to do strobe.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Ganze

customer_reviews.title: Returned because of design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. While I loved the idea that it came with batteries that could be recharged via USB, the closure that holds the front of the unit together with the back of it was tenuous. It felt like it could easily pop open and expose the batteries, and it did! I'm not sure if I got a defective one or if this particular headlamp is constructed that way. For the record, not all Black Diamond headlamps have this problem. I purchased a Cosmo later at REI and it doesn't have this issue. I love the Cosmo!
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget just not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: So the gadget is very lightweight and has a lot of modes and features and is very adjustable. The ability to plug in an USB and recharge the batteries is great and is why I purchased this headlamp in the first place. I really want to love this headlamp, but it just isn't that bright. You can get both lights going, which tears through the batteries, but the "power tap" function normally doesn't work on my unit. I use this for running at night and it just isn't bright enough for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headlamp, mediocre batteries
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned the original older Revolt which I love but had battery issues. The new Revolt improves but still uses the same mediocre batteries. I like the new unit, it's a little smaller and modern looking, feels good for long periods of time, and the LED indicator is easier to see. However the included rechargeable batteries suck. Good news though, you can simply cut the sheath off any rechargeable battery and it will work in this headlamp. I've replaced mine with Energizer lithium batteries and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dave D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Holds charge and provides great light! Used as a Mail Carrier and was never let down. The beam can reach the house ahead without any problems so you're sure not to trip and you can verify the numbers from the street in unfamiliar route. Also great for camping/ hiking after dark when you have access to power to get a full charge- holds the charge for a while unused- I haven't used mine for 2 month and still charged!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Great Headlamp for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: I've used this headlamp on multiple backpacking trips over that past 2yrs. It does great in rain, cold, heat, etc... I use the recharging functionality mainly, but have also used regular batteries as well. I really like the locking function to prevent it getting turned on by accident inside my pack. Strong light, and good general use light to not blind your camping partners. Hiked half dome in Yosemite with it starting at midnight, up to sunrise (great hike by the way).
customer_reviews.author: Colorful

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: I use this for backpacking among other projects around the house when high visibility is necessary. I've noticed after the 2nd backpacking trip, having it stored in the top of my pack that the 2 bottom lenses were cracked. There couldn't have been too much pressure in the top of my pack, and I do not recall dropping it. but either way for a product like this I would kind of expect them to use more durable plastic for the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: The new Black Diamond Revolt is not as bright as ...
customer_reviews.text: The new Black Diamond Revolt is not as bright as it's predecessors and it's not as user friendly. Based on internet product reviews I have decided to try MS Force rechargeable. Not sure about the longevity of MS Force but so far it's brightness far exceeds the Revolt. the MS Force is more cumbersome but again, the brightness of the headlamp outweighs the it's cons. Black Diamond needs to improve on it's current Revolt model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn’t seem to store well. If it sits unused, the battery drains. On/Off button functionality is awkward. The “gear” mechanism that controls beam direction up or down is weak and will surely strip out and be useless fairly quickly. Not as excited about it as I thought I would be.
customer_reviews.author: S. Offenberger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great headlamp for walking my dogs at night. It has many light options with both white and red options. Red light is easy to switch to while walking towards people or cars. I haven’t mastered the tap on the side to change light setting. Also great it is rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: T Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: good headlamp, but red light is too weak to be useful
customer_reviews.text: White light it works great. The red light is not usable to walk around camp, only useful to read something close to your face. You can charge it by taking the batteries out or by plugging a cord in which is nice. As with all of them the battery compartment is not sealed so I would not suggest letting it get too wet.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Battery case is loose!
customer_reviews.text: Light is otherwise great (luminosity, functions etc) except for the fact that the battery case opens randomly, and on my first night of casual use I lost one of the (irreplaceable, since I am in a remote location) rechargable batteries twice. I had not even noticed that it had opened, lost a battery, and re-closed. Now it is firmly taped shut but this is completely absurd for a newly purchased item. With the exception of this issue, the light is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies shortly after charging
customer_reviews.text: After initial batteries dies, I tried charging it with the cord. Light indicated green and full battery, but as soon as I left the house, it turned to red and battery failed. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Girl 415

customer_reviews.title: Great for rowing
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good, lightweight headlamp for evening rowing. This product fits the bill perfectly. Adjustable brightness is nice when looking for hazards (buoys, sea lions) in the water, while making yourself visible to other boaters. The USB Charger is convenient for a quick charge when driving to the boathouse. Also very good for bicycling in the evening
customer_reviews.author: Ken and Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Bright light with comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I tend to do most of my running at night. This requires a bright light with a comfortable fit headband. This headlamp does both well. It has multiple modes and brightness levels. Both are easy to change between while running. I tend to only need super bright or bright when running. The other red light and dim modes are perfect for hiking and camping. It doesn’t have a pad for the forehead which many reviews point out, but I’ve worn this thing for hours at a time and had no issues. I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Globemaster 3

customer_reviews.title: Great light in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, takes about 4 hours to fully charge, complex system to trigger the various light modes, but comes with a guide to the light options and intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fung

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ReVolt; purchased to use while camping. While driving we like the convenience of recharging them via the USB in our vehicle. This model is a bit better than mine; two white light settings and when turned off and back on it automatically goes to the last setting. This model also has a red light feature, where mine doesn't. Not something my wife uses, but I do when I have to rummage around outside and not complete destroy my night vision.
customer_reviews.author: bluesy

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but too many settings make it complicated to easily switch back and forth. I can see this becoming very frustrating trying to figure it out in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable?! Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Light-weight, rechargeable, feel like it will last a long time. In other headlamps, the clasp to open/close to replace the batteries always broke, so headlamps in the past became disposable very quickly or you'd have to use ugly tape! FINALLY, a rechargeable headlamp! We backpack with a light-weight solar panel, so we can now recharge our headlamps, our phones (for photos and GPS), and more. It's so awesome! Great gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Prime4Lifer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don't last
customer_reviews.text: Had about 50% illumination from a full charge on my first use. I like the physical attributes of this headlamp, but not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Must be put in lock mode to charge
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t say this in the manual but it truly works perfectly if you enable lock mode by holding the power button down for about 5-6 seconds till blue flashes then charge it. Hope this helps someone
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Never worked appropriately. The light has a dark point in the middlerk point in
customer_reviews.text: Never worked... I bought it to my father that is 88 years old and need it to read. The light is not uniform, has a dark point in the middle. My father lives in Brasil and when I could bring again the product to USA I lost the return window... 😭 can you help me?
customer_reviews.author: Claudina

customer_reviews.title: and can dim or brighten gradually very easily just by holding down the button
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light, and can dim or brighten gradually very easily just by holding down the button. Didn't time battery life, but after using for several hours, i still haven't had to charge it again with no loss of output, so at this point, looks like the description is accurate. I haven't submerged it yet, and don't really expect to ever have to, but if i ever accidentally drop it in the pool, I'll come back and update the review:)
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Comfortable and bright.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this headlamp. I bought it for winter farm chores, and it’s been a life saver. It’s bright enough for my purposes, and even when the battery is low I find it sufficient for the work I do. Typically it gets about 45 minutes or continuous use a day, sometimes longer, and needs recharged once every week or two. Also notable, it is so comfortable!!! I forget that I have it on, and it barely leaves any marks.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality head lamp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brand, Black Diamond is the best. Bought one of these for the hubby and all the kids. Multi use tool, love the adjustable tilt feature, very bright light, great product, we use ours all the time. I even wear it around my neck when I walk the dog in the evening to be visible.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product made in china
customer_reviews.text: Charge does not work. Contacted Black Diamond service center but no feedback. Poor quality product made in china. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Held up in thunderstorm and duststorm
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Used in a thunderstorm and a duststorm. Able to easily recharge with portable solar charger while camping. The red light is extremely handy. The multiple settings take some practice. I advise bringing the instruction booklet on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second one worse than the first
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in December.. it broke in February and purchased another as a replacement. The second one was a lower quality than the first
customer_reviews.author: Brandmuffin

customer_reviews.title: would be great if the charging actually worked
customer_reviews.text: charging stopped working after a couple of months: red flashing light. If this is a light to use in the hills - good luck with the overly complex settings. you want something that works - not Windows 98 Back to a simple and more powerful option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent head lamp. Controls are a bit confusing. I expected more as I purchased based on reviews and don’t think there is much to justify the price on this one.
customer_reviews.author: lmo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I bought this before but now they have updated it. I had issues with the older model so don't go by those reviews. This thing is bright and has lots of different lighting options. Light and comfortable and the best part is the USB charging.
customer_reviews.author: mafitzinger

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Bright. A little confusing and difficult to switch between the lights, but once you get the hang of it, not too bad. Bright enough. Wasnt thinking that they were rechargeable removable batteries, just rechargeable. But I'm okay with that. Arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Bill

customer_reviews.title: Worked great... for a little while
customer_reviews.text: I have used one headlamp or another every day for several years, and I was hoping this was the one that had it all. It worked great and was awesome to be able to recharge for about three months, then the batteries quit holding a charge for more than a few days, and then it wouldn't charge anymore. I put other batteries in it and it just quit working. Very disappointed. I gave it two stars instead of one because it has so much potential.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Cook

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: the black diamond batteries that came with it have either stopped taking a charge or the headlamp charger is busted. would be better off getting rechargeable batteries and a cheaper headlamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Night Light with Pazazz
customer_reviews.text: This is the bees knees. I really like how it can be recharged through a USB cable. The 'red' light mode is handy for when you wake up in the middle of the night and don't want to blind yourself as you stumble through the trees. I didn't realize that a headlamp can have so many features. Way cool.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headlight!
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I was looking for! It's super bright and comfortable to wear. It's adjustable light and head strap. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headlamp
customer_reviews.text: A must have headlamp. The versatility to use the rechargeable batteries that come with it or pop in some Alkaline batteries from any store to keep moving when unable to charge the oem batteries is very important as well as the dimmability. I also bought one for my brother to carry on our motorcycle camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable, will fail on you on the trail.
customer_reviews.text: I got first sample in November 10th, 2018. It was dead on arrival - the light was flickering. I got replacement on November 28th, 2018. It looked like it works fine at home. I took the headlamp on a trip. At first worked fine, showing 'green' charge status. After 20min on the trail it switched off with 'red' charge status. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vytautas Valancius

customer_reviews.title: This is a bright light that seems to last quite ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright light that seems to last quite a while between battery charges. The only problem with it is there is a yellow spot in the light that is apparent if you are reading. For other activities it would probably not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley E. Herran

customer_reviews.title: average lamp from a premium brand
customer_reviews.text: Average headlamp. Battery doesn't hold a charge very long and the button pattern is kind of ridiculously complicated. Just be prepared to flip through every option every time. Petzl makes a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad,  could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome lamp, my only gripe is how annoying it can be when trying to switch between different light settings.
customer_reviews.author: Clothilde J Sypinski

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t use another brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a headlamp for years and always this brand. Only bought this as I lost my other one. Rechargeable, comfortable, durable. I love the adjustable brightness feature. Highly recommend. Use daily
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: You won't go wrong with this headlamp...
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product! Easy to navigate through the features after several tryes. Seems like it will last forever... Absolutely recommend!..
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just what everyone needs.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just as described. I would buy it again. Best brand. Great quality for the price. 100%
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: The white light is extremely bright, however the red light is pretty dull and unfortunately I need red more for my job than the white. Love Black Diamond products, they are cheaper and better than Petzl products so it's a win win.
customer_reviews.author: LittleStar

customer_reviews.title: Rechargable batteries DOA
customer_reviews.text: The headlamp works great with traditional batteries in but the rechargeable batteries that came with this just didn't work (I am guessing the issue is one of the batteries leaked due to green corrosion around the terminals). This is my second black diamond revolt, no issues on the first one and my 4th overall black diamond headlamp. Overall, I love my black diamonds ... but getting a product that is DOA is quite frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until got fully charged - batteries leak!
customer_reviews.text: It worked just perfect. The light is great, both red and white. Battery last forever...everything was great untill I needed to recharge the batteries again...did it and worked for a few weeks. Then before running my 100miles ultra tried to swith to alcaline batteries to ensure longer burn time and SURPRISE!! Opened and found batteries leaking, rust everywhere!! Really bad. I am going to return it!!
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo

customer_reviews.title: HeadLamp
customer_reviews.text: The light works Great especially when trying to focus on small items at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works when you need it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent headlamp. Works great. Little expensive, but get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cave exploring in Belize
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and a very nice bright light. Didn't have to use them very long so can't speak to the battery life but would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, breaks too easily.
customer_reviews.text: This product broke 2 months after I purchased it. Charging port separated from the connector on the inside of the headlamp. Can’t recommend this item at all, only a 30 day return window...
customer_reviews.author: Evan James Stark

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice headlamp. Prefer simpler operation but I’ll get used to it. I had a multi cam set in OEF. What happened to those?
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 months use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in an attempt to reduce the reliance on spare batteries. The first time I tried to recharge it I ran into some issues with the connection, but eventually figured it out. I've taken this out on multiple trips ranging from simple car camping to hunting and rough back country trips. This product doesn't stand the test of durability. I will be returning it to BD.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Shorting out 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Received Oct19, 2018. The light goes dem on its on. Must have a short. No address nor contact available for return. Worked good about 2 weeks before going dem. Unless buyer replaced this one, and could find him, I'd never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Not one

customer_reviews.title: Has night vision mode
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and very comfortable on head. Took camping for 4 days and held charge. Has various brightness modes, night vision aswell . USB and rechargable batteries included. Build quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Must for handsfree working
customer_reviews.text: Been using headlamps for 20 years. This and pelicans are great
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Not really water proof
customer_reviews.text: The plastic clip to access was cheaply made and metal connector was exposed to outside. I dont think this is water proof. Not worth to pay this price. I dont recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design on charging port cover. Once too open it to charge, it simply will never close again. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sellon

customer_reviews.title: Bright and light!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for! Had a pair and sadly lost them! So from past experience I know this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: stephen r. wissler

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great bright light that you can re-charge on your pc. Black Diamond makes great lamps
customer_reviews.author: Mike Monasmith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s bright and my husband says it’s the best head lamp he’s had. Worth thre $
customer_reviews.author: Holly Keller

customer_reviews.title: Outshines them all
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many head lamps like this one but this one far-out shines them all. Ease-of-use and comfortability.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Riser

customer_reviews.title: Not good for running.
customer_reviews.text: The light is fine, the strap is terrible. Too loose and not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Brightness!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it long enough to make a decision on battery life. But the brightness is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: ben C. Huggins

customer_reviews.title: works, recharges easy
customer_reviews.text: the light is bright, the functions are easy to use, the dimmer is a nice touch for reading. Good camp light.
customer_reviews.author: matthew overall

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It lasts less than an hour on a charge. Way overpriced for the quality and performance
customer_reviews.author: Bruce62

customer_reviews.title: Does not recharge
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for just one year, it no longer recharges. The purpose of rechargable is to reduce battery usage, but that is not the case with this headlamp. Buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Quintal

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to me and it is everything I wanted in a headlamp!
customer_reviews.author: Tomilyn N Siegerist

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For recreational back-packing, this more than does the trick. Don't expect it to outlast or outperform Fenix or zebralight.
customer_reviews.author: TimS

customer_reviews.title: hike at night
customer_reviews.text: excellent choice for night hiking. the light is powerful and battery life is as ecpected
customer_reviews.author: Rabih Zihri

customer_reviews.title: Light settings are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Charge lasts a long time. The light settings are GR8.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Unik

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Black Diamond head lamp. I mistakenly bought the rechargeable model. The light dims pretty quickly compared to the battery powered light. Ive had it a month or so..probably going to have purchase another battery powered one. I DO like the Black Diamond product.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: Used this one time for a 13 hour night trail race...hasn't worked since. Replaced the batteries and it still doesn't work. Should have read all the reviews prior to buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: This Black Diamond headlight is waterproof, bright and has decent battery life you can't ask for much more!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Has different light options. Super long battery life
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: dont get the blue one
customer_reviews.text: dont get me wrong great head lamp. every time i have gotten a blue one it doesn’t work. BLUE IS CURSED
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Anton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great illumination. Battery life is good. I love the red light. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jeffrey Davis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to charge (usb) and solid. Love it. Gonna buy more to put in my cars as emergency light.

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Revolt
product_meta.description:
* Illuminate each step of your trek with the Black Diamond® ReVolt headlamp.
 * Ideal for climbing, hiking, camping, and any other adventures that take you out past dark. 
 * Sleek, low-profile design. 
 * One TriplePower LED, two SinglePower white LEDs, and two SinglePower red LEDs.
 * Proximity lighting offers a large area of light that makes hiking down the trail easier.
 * Dimming feature allows you to adjust the amount of light to fit the activity at hand. 
 * Red night-vision mode has proximity and strobe settings, and activates without needing to cycle through white mode. 
 * Includes full strength in proximity and distance modes, dimming, strobe, red night-vision, and lock modes.
 * Three-level power meter displays remaining battery life. 
 * USB-rechargeable with the option of using three AAA alkaline or three NiMH batteries.
 * Lumens: 130
 * Max Distances:
   Alkaline
   · TriplePower: 70 m/230 ft
   · SinglePower: 9 m/30 ft
   NiMH
   · TriplePower: 66 m/217 ft
   · SinglePower: 8 m/26.2 ft
 * Max Burn Time:
   Alkaline
   · TriplePower: 300 hours
   · SinglePower: 80 hours
   NiMH
   · TriplePower: 190 hours
   · SinglePower: 80 hours
 * IPX Rating: 4
   Protected against splashing water.
 * Weight With Batteries: 97 g/3.4 oz
 * Head Strap Length: 28 in
 * Imported.
feature_bullets: One Triple Power LED and 1 Double Power LED can combine to emit up to 300 lumens
One Double Power Red LED for night vision has proximity and strobe settings
low-profile design uses three Black Diamond AAA Rechargeable Batteries or standard alkaline or lithium batteries
Programmable Brightness Memory gives you the option to set the light's brightness when first turned on
Three-level power meter shows remaining battery life for three seconds after switching on headlamp
